comment: Kyle is a great professor and I will be taking him for Publication Design next semester. He is super personable and cares about all of his students. He is accessible outside class and gives great feedback as well. Super funny, super nice, overall great dude and I would recommend him to anyone. I've enjoyed his class thoroughly!

A very fun and engaging class for publication Design, although the back half of the semester was a bit rushed, we managed to deliver our projects in time! Great feedback, and open projects that help you stretch your creative chops!

Easily my favorite professor at KSU. His class is fun to be in and he's super supportive. He has clear grading guidelines, clear goals, and works with you through every project to make sure you're on the right track. I learned a lot about design and the programs in his class. If you're in the graphic communications concentration he is a must take.

I definitely recommend taking a class with Kyle at least once! His classes are very laid-back and you will create art you can actually use in your portfolio. He uses class time for critiques, so most of your work will be done at home. He doesn't take attendance but he will notice if you're not there and it will affect your project grade.

This is the second time I've taken Kyle! He makes the class fun and doesn't limit your creativity regarding projects. Do expect a lot of work-in-progress critiques since that's how he mainly uses class time. He gives great feedback and will push due dates if needed. You do need to come to class since participation is part of your project grade.
Professor Kyle is a young professor who is very relatable, fun, and has a lot of knowledge in the field. He has fun projects and is flexible to let you be as creative as you want!
This is the best design professor you can have at Kennesaw State University. He is wonderfully approachable and easy to work with. Bring your best effort because Mr. DeAnna brings his.
